title: If the Pork Croutons touched the salad, is it najis or can I remove it and eat? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: NZ from aan um sh while visiting um they served as a salad and there were some like Crown tones on it that were very similar and most likely these were the crens that contain pork and we ate Sal but not the crons themselves uh but this Sal like touch this crons have Commit the sin yes of course if there is pork within a meal even if you remove the pork the whole meal is nous and you cannot uh consume it or serve it
